Articles.Content:
Hello guys,

I love this game very much but I lost the game since I had to reinstall my computer (only windows), so today I installed the game again because of the new economic boom update.

I started the game and I was excited to see the new features, I made a new game and I looked in every building, then after like 2 minutes I was not in able to press on the return button anymore, I click on it and nothing happens, I started a new game again and now I couldn't even click on a building, so this is very very weird, I never had this issue before.

So my question is how to fix this? I really want to play.

I was thinking that im maybe missing some software the game needs? normally when I instal a new game steam will update some software stuff but this didnt happened for ksp.

Thanks

Edited October 10, 2014 by onlinegamesz

Hey onlinegamesz,

I can't tell from your description what the problem might be. When you can, please check out the link below. It will tell you what kind of information we need in order to try and help you better. Things like what operating system, screenshots, and where the log files are kept.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Cheers,

~Claw

Alright, I did a fresh install and it works again, weird enough it wasn't fixed when I did verify integrity of game cache.

Anyway thanks for the help and sorry for bothering.
